p: The number of patients with PDS and EPS was 23 and 19 in the intervention group and 22 and 22 in the control group, respectively. The mean scores of PDS and EPS in the week before the intervention were 8.4 ± 1.1 and 8.3 ± 1.2 in the intervention group and 8.1 ± 1.1 and 7.5 ± 1.3 in the control group, respectively, which, there was no statistically significant difference between the two arms (PDS ( p = 0.48) and EPS ( p = 0.052)).
